subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which fort was built by Maharaja Pratap Singh of Mewar?
question_hi: मैवाराज्य में महाराजा प्रताप सिंग के बाद बनाया गया किस किलों का मुख्य प्रमाणित करने वाली विश्वासना काम ?
explanation_en: Amer Fort is the main citadel built by Pratap Singh after the death of Vishwasnath, but the correct answer is Kumbhalgarh Fort, which was built by Rana Kumbha.
explanation_hi: आमेर में प्रतिपाद संत के अंतर्यांकनार से बना गया रानी कुम्भागार
